definition: don't get involved/ignore it!/don't have anything to do with (him, her etc)/don't speak to
surname Bie
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Don't mind them, she whispers to the child.
sentences.chinese: 别理他们，她轻声对孩子说。

sentences.english: So don't pay any attention to his words. It's nothing, right?
sentences.chinese: 所以，别理他，他的话一点用也没有，对吧？

sentences.english: Senor Dahlmann, don't pay any attention to those lads; they're half high.
sentences.chinese: 达尔曼先生，那些小伙子醉了，别理他们。

sentences.english: Don't you listen to these nitwits you hear me?
sentences.chinese: 别理别人怎么说，你听到吗？

sentences.english: So what if India wants to sell , go ahead sell, why worried about China.
sentences.chinese: 所以嘛，印度要是想卖武器，虽然卖，别理中国。

sentences.english: Pay no attention to him, he's hectoring upon you.
Nonsense was written, but his attitude was, 'Don't talk to them or you'll never get rid of them.'
sentences.chinese: 但他总是说‘别理他们，不然你永远摆脱不了他们。’

sentences.english: Let him be he's doing no harm.
sentences.chinese: 别理他，他不要紧，没事的。

sentences.english: Do no manage that woman, she all so.
sentences.chinese: 别理那女人，她一直这样。

sentences.english: Ignore that red string, that is just a safety.
sentences.chinese: 先别理红色细绳，那是以防万一。

sentences.english: Leave her alone. She's natural crier .
sentences.chinese: 别理她，她是个天生爱哭的人。

sentences.english: Leave must alone. He must have been drunk.
sentences.chinese: 别理他，他一定是喝醉了。

sentences.english: Try to avoid strangers no matter what treats they give you.
sentences.chinese: 无论陌生人给你什么好处都别理他们。

sentences.english: "Just keep walking, " I muttered to Hassan.
sentences.chinese: “别理他，快走”我小声对哈桑说。

definition: not to pay attention to/to leave sth as it is/to ignore
variant of 不答理[bu4 da1 li3]
not wishing to acknowledge sb/unwilling to respond
no matter (who, what etc)
(dialect) very
contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
to refuse to acknowledge/to pay no attention to/to take no notice of/to ignore
(coll.) Don't waste your breath./Save it!
miserable wretch/contemptible individual
to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind
to talk bullshit
don’t worry about (it, him etc)/doesn’t matter/whatever/anyway
lit. to climb all over sb/fig. to take advantage of sb's weakness
get out of here!/beat it!
to lower oneself to sb's level/to argue with sb less well-informed
bitch/slut
to make a scene/to fool around/to behave foolishly
